query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Godi, Fiorenza, poi che se’ sì grande 2 che per mare e per terra batti l’ali, 3 e per lo ’nferno tuo nome si spande!
query.error: **English:** 1 Rejoice, Florence, since you are so great 2 that you beat your wings over sea and land, 3 and your name spreads even through hell!
query.result: 1 Bergembiralah, Florence, karena kamu begitu agung 2 sehingga kamu mengepakkan sayapmu di laut dan darat, 3 dan namamu menyebar bahkan melalui neraka!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Tra li ladron trovai cinque cotali 5 tuoi cittadini onde mi ven vergogna, 6 e tu in grande orranza non ne sali.
query.error: **English:** 4 Among the thieves I found five such 5 of your citizens that I am ashamed of them, 6 and you do not rise up in great fear because of it.
query.result: 4 Di antara para pencuri aku menemukan lima orang 5 warga negaramu yang membuatku malu, 6 dan kamu tidak bangkit dalam ketakutan besar karenanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Ma se presso al mattin del ver si sogna, 8 tu sentirai, di qua da picciol tempo, 9 di quel che Prato, non ch’altri, t’agogna.
query.error: **English:** 7 But if near the morning of truth one dreams, 8 you will hear, from now on a short time, 9 of what Prato, not others, yearns for you.
query.result: 7 Tetapi jika mendekati pagi kebenaran seseorang bermimpi, 8 kamu akan mendengar, mulai dari sekarang dalam waktu yang singkat, 9 tentang apa yang Prato, bukan yang lain, dambakan untukmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 E se già fosse, non saria per tempo. 11 Così foss’ ei, da che pur esser dee! 12 ché più mi graverà, com’ più m’attempo.
query.error: **English:** 10 And if it were already, it would not be in time. 11 So be it, since it must be! 12 For it will weigh on me more, the older I get.
query.result: 10 Dan jika sudah, itu tidak akan tepat waktu. 11 Biarlah begitu, karena memang harus begitu! 12 Karena itu akan lebih membebankanku, semakin aku bertambah tua.
